customer_service_representative.title: Customer Service Representative
customer_service_representative.location: Tatu City, Kenya / Cape Town, South Africa
customer_service_representative.description: Join our dynamic customer service team providing omnichannel support across voice and digital platforms for international clients from UK, US, Australia, and New Zealand.
key_responsibilities: Handle customer inquiries via phone, chat, and email
Provide excellent customer service and support
Resolve customer issues efficiently and professionally
Maintain accurate customer records and documentation
Meet performance targets and quality standards
requirements: High school diploma or equivalent qualification
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Previous customer service experience preferred but not required
Strong computer literacy and typing skills (minimum 35 WPM)
Ability to work flexible shifts including evenings and weekends
Problem-solving skills and patience with customers
preferred_qualifications: Multilingual abilities (especially French, Arabic, or local languages)
Previous BPO or call center experience
benefits: Competitive salary package with performance bonuses
Career advancement opportunities within CCI Global
customer_service_representative.salary_range: Competitive market rates based on experience and location

technical_support_specialist.title: Technical Support Specialist
technical_support_specialist.location: Multiple locations: Kenya, South Africa, Ghana, Egypt
technical_support_specialist.description: Provide advanced technical expertise and support for complex operational queries across telecommunications, e-commerce, and technology sectors for our international client base.
key_responsibilities: Diagnose and resolve complex technical issues
Provide Level 2/3 technical support to customers
Document technical solutions and create knowledge base articles
Collaborate with engineering teams on product improvements
Train junior staff on technical procedures
Handle warranty claims and product support queries
requirements: Bachelor's degree in IT, Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent experience
3+ years of technical support or IT experience
Experience with software applications, operating systems, and hardware
Knowledge of networking, databases, or cloud technologies
preferred_qualifications: Experience in telecommunications or e-commerce sectors
ITIL or similar service management framework knowledge
benefits: Attractive compensation package with technical allowances
International client exposure and career growth
technical_support_specialist.salary_range: Above market rates with technical premium
